titleStmt.title: SII 7.150: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 150. (A.R. No. 137 of 1900). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA, RIGHT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevuvaḷar tiruppoṉmātu puṇara nāmātukalaimakaḷ nalamperutu ciṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ ve
lpuyat tiruppa Icaiyiṉ celviyum Eṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar vantiṟaiñca niṇilamaṭantai
taiyait tirumaṇam puṇarntu cirvaḷar tirumamaṇimuṭi kavitteṉat tirumuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattu palluyirkkellā me
llaiyi liṉpa mikaviṉi teyta veṇkuṭai niḻaṟkiḻ ceṅko locci vāḻi pallūḻi Āḻi naṭappa cempoṉ virasiṅṅāsaṉat
tu puvanamuḻutumuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakecaripaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻa
devaṟku yāṇṭu patinaiñcāvatu vaṭakarai virutarāyapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu Iruṅkoḷappāṭip paruvūrkūṟṟattu U
ṭaiyār tirumutukuṉṟamuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku Iṉṉāṭṭu brahmadeyam Uṟumurāṉa coḻapāṇṭiyaccaturvvedimaṅkalamāṉa Eṟumpūr kāṇi
yuṭaiya paḷḷiĀḷappiṟantāṉ Eḻicaimokaṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻakkāṭavarātittaneṉ Uṭaiyār tirumutukuṉṟamuṭaiyanāyaṉār
kku mahāsnamaṉam paṇṇiyaruḷa Eṉperāl Eḻicaimokaṉtirumaṇṭapameṉṟu tirukkaṟṟaḷi cātti Ittaṉmañ ceytu muṭitteṉ Ā
ḷappiṟantāṉ Eḻicaimokaṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻak kāṭavarātittaneṉ Ittevar tevatāṉamāna Ūrkaḷil pā
ṭikāval Uḷḷiṭṭa Epperppaṭṭa varikaḷum Iṉnāyaṉār śrīhattatte nir vārttuviṭṭeṉ kulottuṅ
kacoḻak kāṭavarātittaneṉ . Ittanmam yeṉ vaṅśattārum Encātiyiluḷḷārum maṟṟum māreṉum Aḻi
vu ceyvār śrīyāññai . geṅkaikkaraiyile koṭi pacuk konṟāṉ pāvaṅ koḷvān vallavaraiyan cūḷaṟa
vu Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.150 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
